title: Oil in Pakistan
creator_credit: Anthony Gilkison, Rayant Pictures and Sydney Samuelson
brief_description: The search for oil in Pakistan. Shows the difficulties encountered, the complicated processes involved in an oil survey, and the discovery of the large reservoir of natural gas at Sui.
